                        <input type="radio" id="report_reason_one" data-type="18" name="report_reason" class="rd">

                        <label for="report_reason_one" class="">假冒伪劣</label>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="report_reason_two" data-type="27" name="report_reason" class="rd">
                        <label for="report_reason_two"></label>
                        <label for="report_reason_two">违禁商品</label>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="report_reason_three" data-type="28" name="report_reason" class="rd">
                        <label for="report_reason_three"></label>
                        <label for="report_reason_three">其他违规</label>
                    </li>
                </ul>
                <button>确认提交</button>
            </div>
        </li>

        <li class="li other goods" id="haojia_error2" data-name="侵权举报">
            侵权举报
            <div class="other_report_box goods_report_box">
                请选择举报理由：
                <ul class="report_reason report_reason1">
                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error2_one" data-type="21" name="haojia_error2" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error2_one"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error2_one" class="">商品图片侵权</label>
                    </li>

                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error2_two" data-type="22" name="haojia_error2" class="rd">

                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error2_three" data-type="23" name="haojia_error2" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error2_three"></label>

                    </li>

                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error2_four" data-type="24" name="haojia_error2" class="rd">

                    </li>

                    
                </ul>
                <button>确认提交</button>
            </div>
        </li>
        <!-- 新增其他举报 -->
        <li class="li other goods" data-name="其他" data-type="29" id="other_alert">
            其他
        </li>
    </ul>
</div>
      <!--打分模块-   id 是  rating_  +  文章id  -->

                                    <div class="J_replay comment-main-list-item-content-info-replay">回复</div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 展示出的回复框 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea">
                                <!-- 回复表单 在隐藏域中填写参数 -->
                                <form class="comment-quick-form" onsubmit="return false;" method="post" action="">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="type" value="3">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="comment_type" value="">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="pid" value="99831139">
                                    <input type="hidden" name="parentid" value="296485473">
                                    <textarea name="content" placeholder="回复给lyrill"></textarea>
                                </form>
                                <!-- 表情包及表单提交操作 -->
                                <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea-opertion">
                                    <div class="comment_smileBox">
                                        <i class="icon-expression"></i>
                                        <div class="smileLayerBg" id="smiley" style="display: none;"></div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div>
                                        <p>校验提示文案</p>
                                        <div class="J_submit">提交</div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <!-- 二级评论 -->
                        <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-reply">
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-reply-container">
                                                            </div>
                                                    </div>
                    </div>
                </li>
                            </ul>
            <!-- 分页样式 -->
                    </div>
        <!-- 最新 -->
        <div class="tab_info comment-main" id="commentTabBlockNew" style="display: none;">

    </div>
